page.title: 03Blandford - Children's Homes
page.content:
In our Survey of 271 families with children aged 5-9 years we find:-
206 own their home 125 have a video recorder 103 have a home computer 234 have a car 229 have a freezer 143 have one wage/salary earner 101 have two wage/salary earners 16 have no earners 185 have homes with 7 or more rooms
The vast majority of their homes were built in the last 20 years;90 are semi detached, 72 are terraced and 101 live in detached properties.
Our survey shows that most of the householders (165) and their partners (141) were born outside Dorset. Only 11% are Blandford born.
